name: Boots of Striding
text: During your movement, add +2 %game.action.move% to the movement.

name: Winged Shoes
text: During your movement, add %game.action.jump% to the movement.

name: Hide Armor
text: On the next two sources of damage to you from attacks, gain %game.action.shield% 1.

name: Leather Armor
text: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
text: During your turn, gain %game.condition.invisible%.

name: Eagle-Eye Goggles
text: During your attack, gain Advantage on the entire Attack action.

name: Iron Helmet
text: When attacked, consider any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws to be a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

name: Heater Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.

name: Piercing Bow
text: During your ranged attack, ignore all Shield values for the entire Attack action.

name: War Hammer
text: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.stun% to the entire Attack action.

name: Poison Dagger
text: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.poison% to a single attack.

name: Minor Healing Potion
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 3, self" action.

name: Minor Stamina Potion
text: During your turn, Recover %game.card.recover% up to two of your discarded cards.

name: Minor Power Potion
text: During your attack, add +1 %game.action.attack% to your entire Attack action.

name: Boots of Speed
text: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leading initiative value by 10.

name: Cloak of Pockets
text: You can carry two additional %game.items.slots.small% items.

name: Empowering Talisman
text: During your turn, Refresh %game.card.refresh% one of your consumed %game.items.slots.small% items.

name: Battle-Axe
text: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following:

name: Weighted Net
text: During your ranged attack, add %game.condition.immobilize% to a single attack.

name: Minor Mana Potion
text: During your turn, create any element.

name: Stun Powder
text: During your attack, add %game.condition.stun% to a single attack.

name: Heavy Greaves
text: You are immune to all forced movement caused by enemies or scenario effects.

name: Chainmail
text: On the next three sources of damage to you from attacks, gain %game.action.shield% 1.

name: Amulet of Life
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self" action.

name: Jagged Sword
text: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.wound% to a single attack.

name: Long Spear
text: Turn a single-target melee attack into the following: *line_0_1_1*

name: Major Healing Potion
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 5, self" action.

name: Moon Earring
text: During your turn, Refresh %game.card.refresh% all of your spent items.

name: Comfortable Shoes
text: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card, perform a "%game.action.move% 3" action instead of a "%game.action.move% 2" action.

name: Studded Leather
text: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.

name: Hawk Helm
text: During your ranged attack, add +1 %game.action.range% to your entire Attack action.

name: Tower Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack.

name: Volatile Bomb
text: During your single-target ranged attack action, turn the attack into the following: *cone_1_1*

name: Major Stamina Potion
text: During your turn, Recover %game.card.recover% up to three of your discarded cards.

name: Boots of Dashing
text: During your movement, add +3 %game.action.move% to the movement.

name: Robes of Evocation
text: During your attack, %game.element.consume.wild%  to add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire Attack action.

name: Heavy Basinet
text: You are immune to %game.condition.stun% and %game.condition.muddle%.

name: Hooked Chain
text: During your ranged attack, add %game.action.pull% 2 to the entire Attack action.

name: Versatile Dagger
text: Whenever you use the default top of an ability card, perform an "%game.action.attack% 3" action instead of an "%game.action.attack% 2" action.

name: Major Power Potion
text: During your attack, add +2 %game.action.attack% to your entire Attack action.

name: Ring of Haste
text: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the bottom action of the card.

name: Boots of Quickness
text: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, increase or decrease your leading initiative value by 20.

name: Splintmail
text: On the next four sources of damage to you from attacks, gain %game.action.shield% 1.

name: Pendant of Dark Pacts
text: During your turn, Refresh %game.card.refresh% two of your consumed %game.items.slots.small% items. Gain %game.condition.curse%.

name: Spiked Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 1 and %game.action.retaliate% 2 for the attack.

name: Reaping Scythe
text: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following:  *cleave_0_1*

name: Major Mana Potion
text: During your turn, create any two elements.

name: Sun Earring
text: During your turn, Refresh %game.card.refresh% all of your spent items and "%game.action.heal% 3, Self" action.

name: Steel Sabatons
text: If you move 1 or fewer hexes on your turn, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round.

name: Shadow Armor
text: When you are damaged by an attack, suffer no damage instead.

name: Protective Charm
text: You are immune to %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.wound%.

name: Black Knife
text: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.curse% to a single attack.

name: Staff of Eminence
text: During your ranged attack, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire Attack action.

name: Super Healing Potion
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 7, self" action.

name: Ring of Brutality
text: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the top action of the card.

name: Serene Sandals
text: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card perform a "%game.action.move% 4" action instead of a "%game.action.move% 2" action.

name: Cloak of Phasing
text: Gain %game.action.fly%. While occupying an obstacle hex, you are considered %game.condition.invisible% and cannot attack

name: Telescopic Lens
text: During your ranged attack, add +2 %game.action.range% to your entire Attack action

name: Unstable Explosives
text: Turn a single target ranged attack into the following: *cube_2_2*. All allies in the attack area suffer 3 damage.

name: Wall Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 4 for the attack.

name: Doom Powder
text: During your attack, add %game.condition.stun%, %game.condition.poison%, and %game.condition.curse% to a single attack.

name: Lucky Eye
text: During your turn, %game.condition.strengthen% yourself and all adjacent allies.

name: Boots of Sprinting
text: During your movement, add +4 %game.action.move% to the movement.

name: Platemail
text: On the next five sources of damage to you from attacks, gain %game.action.shield% 1.

name: Mask of Terror
text: During your melee attack, add %game.action.push% 1.

name: Balanced Blade
text: Whenever you use the default top of an ability card, perform an "%game.action.attack% 4" instead of an "%game.action.attack% 2" action.

name: Halberd
text: During your single target melee attack, you can attack any single enemy within 2 hexes.

name: Star Earring
text: During your turn, Refresh %game.card.refresh% all of your spent items, "%game.action.heal% 3, Self" action, and Recover %game.card.recover% up to two of your discarded cards.

name: Second Chance Ring
text: At the end of your turn, play two cards from your hand and perform an additional turn this round based on your new leading initiative (which must be later than your previous initiative).

name: Boots of Levitation
text: Gain %game.action.fly%

name: Shoes of Happiness
text: If you move 6 or more hexes on your turn, gain %game.card.experience:1%.

name: Blinking Cape
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.move% 4, %game.action.jump%" action

name: Swordedge Armor
text: On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield% 1, %game.action.retaliate% 1

name: Circlet of Elements
text: During your turn, %game.element.consume.wild% to create any element.

name: Chain Hood
text: While you are adjacent to three or more monsters, gain %game.action.shield% 1

name: Frigid Blade
text: During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.ice% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Storm Blade
text: During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.air% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Inferno Blade
text: During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.fire% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Tremor Blade
text: During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.earth% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Brilliant Blade
text: During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.light% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Night Blade
text: During your melee attack, %game.element.consume.dark% to add +2 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Wand of Frost
text: During your turn, create Ice.

name: Wand of Storms
text: During your turn, create Air.

name: Wand of Infernos
text: During your turn, create Fire.

name: Wand of Tremors
text: During your turn, create Earth.

name: Wand of Brilliance
text: During your turn, create Light.

name: Wand of Darkness
text: During your turn, create Dark.

name: Minor Cure Potion
text: During your turn, remove one negative condition on yourself. This can be used while you have %game.condition.stun%.

name: Major Cure Potion
text: During your turn, remove all negative conditions on yourself. This can be used while you have %game.condition.stun%.

name: Steel Ring
text: When damaged by an attack targeting you, gain %game.action.shield% 4 for the attack.

name: Dampening Ring
text: Before an enemy would consume an element, consume that element instead for no effect

name: Scroll of Power
text: During an ally's attack, add +1 %game.action.attack% to their entire attack action

name: Scroll of Healing
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 3, %game.action.range:5%" action

name: Scroll of Stamina
text: During your turn, an ally within %game.action.range:5% may Recover %game.card.recover% up to two of their discarded cards

name: Rocket Boots
text: During your movement, add +3 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump% to a single movement

name: Endurance Footwraps
text: If you move 4 or more hexes on your turn, perform a ""%game.action.heal% 1, Self"" action.

name: Drakescale Boots
text: You are unaffected by difficult and hazardous terrain.

name: Magma Waders
text: Ignore the damaging effects of hazardous terrain and perform a "%game.action.heal% 2, Self" action on any turn in which you have entered a hazardous terrain hex.

name: Robes of Summoning
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 2, target any summoned ally" action.

name: Second Skin
text: Remove two %game.attackmodifier.minus1% from your attack modifier deck.

name: Sacrificial Robes
text: During your ranged attack, suffer 3 damage to add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire Attack action.

name: Drakescale Armor
text: You are immune to %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.wound%.

name: Steam Armor
text: On the next five sources of damage from attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.shield% 1.

name: Flea-Bitten Shawl
text: You are considered to have an initiative of 99 for the purpose of enemy focusing.

name: Necklace of Teeth
text: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 1, Self" action.

name: Horned Helm
text: After moving 4 or more hexes on your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to your next melee attack this turn.

name: Drakescale Helm
text: Whenever you gain %game.condition.muddle%, gain %game.condition.strengthen% instead.

name: Thief's Hood
text: During your "%game.action.loot% 1" ability, perform a "%game.action.loot% 2" ability instead.

name: Helm of the Mountain
text: When attacked, if %game.element.earth% is Strong, %game.condition.immobilize% the attacker.

name: Wave Crest
text: When attacked, if %game.element.ice% is Strong, perform a "%game.action.push% 2" action targeting the attacker.

name: Ancient Drill
text: During your melee attack, add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.pierce% 2 to the entire Attack action

name: Skullbane Axe
text: During your melee attack targeting a Living Corpse, Living Spirit, or Living Bones, add +5 %game.action.attack% to a single attack.

name: Staff of Xorn
text: During your ranged attack, add %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.muddle% to the entire Attack action

name: Fueled Falchion
text: During your single-target melee attack, the target and all enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage

name: Bloody Axe
text: During your melee attack, suffer 2 damage to add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire Attack action.

name: Staff of Elements
text: During your turn, create any element.

name: Skull of Hatred
text: During your turn, %game.condition.curse% all adjacent enemies.

name: Staff of Summoning
text: During your turn, a summoned ally within %game.action.range:3% performs a "%game.action.move% 3" action with you controlling the action.

name: Orb of Dawn
text: During your turn, %game.element.consume.dark% to create Light.

name: Orb of Twilight
text: During your turn, %game.element.consume.light% to create Dark.

name: Doomed Compass
text: During your turn, force an enemy within %game.action.range:5% to perform a "%game.action.move% 2" action with you controlling the action.

name: Curious Gear
text: During your turn, disarm all traps within %game.action.range:2%.

name: Remote Spider
text: During your turn, %game.condition.poison% all adjacent enemies.

name: Giant Remote Spider
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.loot% 1" action.

name: Black Censer
text: During your turn, %game.condition.muddle% all enemies with %game.action.range:2%.

name: Black Card
text: During your turn, place a character token on an adjacent normal or elite enemy. You add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks targeting this enemy.

name: Helix Ring
text: During your turn, %game.element.consume.light% %game.element.consume.dark% to perform a "%game.action.heal% 25, Self" action

name: Heart of the Betrayer
text: When attacked by an adjacent normal enemy, force the enemy to attack one of its allies within its range instead.

name: Resonant Crystal
text: During your turn, destroy an adjacent obstacle.
